metadata.title: Pets Rule OdoBan Pet Stain and Odor Remover Spray, 32 Ounce Spray Bottle
features: Strong and Effective: Our pet stain and odor remover breaks down pet stains effortlessly, while leaving the area smelling fresh and clean. The formula dries down to a powder but leaves no residue behind.

Bio-Enzymatic Formula: Our pet stain and odor remover uses enzyme action to treat organic stains on multiple types of surfaces. It gently lifts away residue and stench from urine, vomit, feces, blood, grass, and more than your pet may leave behind.

Multi-Surface: Our fast-working formula can be used on many surfaces that your pet may come in contact with including carpet, fabric, upholstery, rugs, pet bedding, clothing, and carpeted car interiors.
How To Use: Spray directly on the stain and immediately blot with a clean, absorbent colorfast cloth or paper towel. Repeat with stubborn stains; follow up with water extraction if needed.
Where to Use: Our spray can be used as a laundry pre-treatment on all colorfast washable water-safe fabrics and on all water-safe carpet and upholstery.
description: Pets Rule OdoBan Pet Stain and Odor Remover Spray stays ahead of the game when you've got pets around. The deep-cleaning formula helps remove stains from pets including the aftermath that a pet may carry of being outside including grass stains, vomit, urine, feces, and more. Our formula not only targets strong stenches, but neutralizes them on the spot, leaving only a fresh scent behind. Simply spray the area affected directly and blot with a clean cloth; repeat as necessary. It can be used on fabrics also including upholstery, drapes, and more. It also leaves behind no sticky or powder residue, so you will have a refreshed space once again as soon as the area dries. Make Life Fresh with OdoBan. *EPA List N (EPA Reg. No 66243-2)
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "3 x 4 x 11 inches; 2 Pounds", "Date First Available": "10M 15, 2021", "Manufacturer": "Clean Control Corp.", "Country of Origin": "USA"}
